mapper.select: select c.id, c.comment_content, c.create_time, u.avatar, u.nickname from t_comment c left join t_user u on c.from_uid = u.id where is_check = 1 order by create_time desc limit 5

select * from (select c.id, c.comment_content, c.create_time, c.from_uid, c.parent_id, u.nickname as fromNickname, u.avatar, c.to_uid, r.nickname as to_nickname, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY parent_id ORDER BY create_time ASC ) row_num
FROM t_comment c JOIN t_user u ON c.from_uid = u.id JOIN t_user r ON c.to_uid = r.id where c.is_check = 1 AND parent_id IN
#{commentId} ) t where 4 > t.row_num
